name: Carrot "Borscht"
keywords: appetizer, carrot, sour cream, summer, vegetarian
recipeIngredient: 1 1/2 pounds large carrots, peeled and coarsely chopped
Salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste
1 cup sour cream or nonfat yogurt

recipeInstructions.text: Put the carrots and onions in a three-quart saucepan and add the water. Bring to a boil and simmer until the carrots are tender, about 20 minutes. Remove from the heat.
Puree in a food processor, then transfer to a bowl or container and stir in the sugar, lemon juice and salt and pepper.
Refrigerate, covered, at least four hours. Serve with a generous dollop of sour cream or yogurt and a sprinkling of chives on each portion.
